metadata.title: Friday, 3rd March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) when the Kafubu Water and Sanitation Company will rehabilitate the sewer system in Roan and MpatamatuTownships in Roan Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b) why the Company has continued to charge sewer fees when the sewer system is non-functional.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to improve production of the following crops in Kalabo District:
(b) if so, what the specific plans are; and

(c) when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address– Motion (28th February) – Resumption of Debate:  (Mr Simunji, MP). ____________________________
